__e: They took me away from my family and sent me to prison when I was 17 years old.
I've gone back there a couple of times, and they always tell me I'm fine and send me back home.

That's why you sent me and the others away.
They sent me home and that was it.
Why would you send for me if you didn't even want me?
Maybe you sent her some texts you didn't want us to see.
They sent her to see him and I never saw her again, okay?
Charges weren't pressed, but after that, we just sent everything we ever got from them to security.
We sent this one to the address you gave us.
Made it human and sent it to you.
